newsitem.title: USA: Parker Drilling to net $53 mln from offer.
newsitem.headline: Parker Drilling to net $53 mln from offer.

text.p: Parker Drilling Co said Tuesday it completed its public offering of seven million shares at $8 per share and will net about $53 million after commissions, fee and expenses.
If an overallotment option is exercised, additional shares will total 1,508,490 shares.
The underwriting group was led by Jefferies & co Inc. Other underwriters included Prudential Securities Inc and Johnson Rice & Co LLC.

In addition, 3,056,600 shares offered by a selling shareholder, Energy Ventures Inc, also were sold. These represent the stock portion of the price at which Parker purchased Mallard Drilling Inc from Energy Ventures last November.

Parker said it intends to use the proceeds to refurbish and upgrade barge, platform and land rigs and to expand rental tool operations. It further said it plans to prepay a portion of its bank term loan.
